Name: Milky Way Echo Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
This Milky Way Echo enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed at a high altitude.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Milky Way Echo enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed at a high altitude. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only on Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
This Milky Way Echo enables you to travel at a noticeably fast speed at a high altitude.
